inputs.remark:
V1: Replace speech audiometry with:
Right: WRS 33% @80, 57% @100 (with contralateral masking), 60% @110.
Left: WRS 50% @80, 77% @100 (with contralateral masking), 80% @110.

logic_summary: Updated Speech audiometry result summary to reflect corrected WRS values and include masked thresholds as specified in the remarks, while retaining the existing SRT values.

patch_ops.value: Very poor recognition bilaterally, worse in right ear. Right SRT 70 dB, WRS 33% @80, 57% @100 (with contralateral masking), 60% @110. Left SRT 50 dB, WRS 50% @80, 77% @100 (with contralateral masking), 80% @110.
